title: Can spinning "beachball" while opening word files be a board issue??
message: Prob stupid question but  I was just wondering if spinning beach ball when opening programs can be a logic board issue??

title: Can spinning "beachball" while opening word files be a board issue??
Can spinning "beachball" while opening word files be a board issue??
message: I Replaced U5110 on this board and now the customer is saying everything is working fine except word files are opening slowly (beach ball pops up)

title: Can spinning "beachball" while opening word files be a board issue??
message: Run ASD, I bet there is a sensor issue. VP0R or VD0R...

title: Can spinning "beachball" while opening word files be a board issue??
message: Kinda sounds like a dying hard drive. Victoria scan it?
